titleStmt.title: The proceedings on the King's commissions of the peace, and oyer and terminer, and gaol-delivery of Newgate, held for the city of London, and county of Middlesex, at justice-hall, in the Old-Baily, the 10th. and 13th. days of OCtober, 1688, and in the fourth year of His Majesties reign
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Quarter Sessions of the Peace (London)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
